title: A Complete Guide to Pisces and Capricorn Compatibility

steps.content: Pisces and Capricorn are very compatible. This might seem surprising since they're so different, but they each bring strengths to the relationship. Pisces is attracted to Capricorn's steady, loyal personality, while Capricorn is drawn to Pisces' intuitive and supportive nature. Their differences push them to become better versions of themselves .

steps.title: These two find a satisfying balance in the bedroom.
steps.content: These two find a satisfying balance in the bedroom. Capricorn is a cardinal sign , which means they're the start of their zodiac season. As an initiator, they take charge! Fortunately, Pisces is a mutable sign, which means they're flexible and willing to try anything. Plus, Capricorn pays attention to the material aspects of lovemaking—they'll set the mood and pamper Pisces, while Pisces helps Capricorn emotionally connect. Capricorn's erogenous area is their legs, while Pisces' erogenous zone is their feet.

steps.title: Pisces and Capricorn are emotional opposites.
steps.content: Pisces and Capricorn are emotional opposites. As a water sign, Pisces is the dreamer of the zodiac, so they're sensitive and intuitive. Capricorn is an earth sign, so they're much more grounded and practical—think logic instead of emotion. These two sometimes struggle to connect, but if they understand each other's emotional communication style, they can relate to one another. [2] X Research source Capricorn isn't an emotionally open sign, but they do express their love by being practical and helpful toward those they love. Pisces can inspire Capricorn to connect with their feelings. With a little time, Capricorn can learn to open up and be vulnerable.

steps.title: A Pisces-Capricorn relationship is built on a strong foundation of trust.
steps.content: A Pisces-Capricorn relationship is built on a strong foundation of trust. Capricorn is ruled by Saturn—the planet of responsibility and dedication. Pisces is drawn to that commitment, so they'll be loyal and enjoy Capricorn's support. This couple has definite long-term potential. Pisces is co-ruled by Jupiter and Neptune, the planets of higher learning and dreams. This unique nature appeals to Capricorn—they always have something to talk about! Reader Poll: We asked 707 wikiHow readers who are Pisces about relationship deal breakers, and 62% of them agreed that their biggest deal breaker is someone who lies . [Take Poll]

steps.title: This pair doesn't have the same communication style, but they can make it work.
steps.content: This pair doesn't have the same communication style, but they can make it work. Pisces can be a little unpredictable and indecisive, so they might ramble or change their mind. Capricorn is much more direct and clear, and this can make Pisces feel like they're being talked down to. Although Pisces is a master texter, Capricorn struggles with texting unless there's a problem to be solved. If Pisces is looking for help, Capricorn's just a quick message away. However, if Pisces wants to talk about the relationship, they're better off doing it in person.

steps.title: A Pisces-Capricorn couple has the potential for a harmonious relationship.
steps.content: A Pisces-Capricorn couple has the potential for a harmonious relationship. If these signs learn to appreciate their different communication styles, they can really inspire each other. Pisces should value Capricorn's reliable nature, while Capricorn should get in touch with their own feelings. If they do, these two can bring out the best in each other!
